author: chris2_2_2
content: Do any of the clients try to appeal more to commercial users like exchanges or dapps? Or does each try to appeal to all users equally.

author: sky.cactus
content: I believe Besu and Nethermind both target enterprise customers.

author: chris2_2_2
content:
Any idea what they do different to appeal to enterprise customers?

Aka what is needed at scale for instance lots of txs a second?

author: sky.cactus
content: My guess is white glove service and support contracts.

author: chris2_2_2
content: Interesting. Good to see that some of the teams aren't just funded by donations.

author: sky.cactus
content: Nethermind has a plug-in system which makes it easy to extend for individual customer needs.
